title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 517.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 517.1 - Scope

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to fiscal audits and reviews of a provider's claims, books, records, reports or other available documentation. (b) Audits and reviews conducted pursuant to
this Part do not preclude the department or any other authorized governmental
body or agency from taking any other action with respect to the provider, including obtaining overpayments or restitution pursuant to a finding of
unacceptable practices, auditing or reviewing of other payments or claims for
payment for the same or similar periods, or taking any other action authorized
by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
517.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
